Text.Page:
[Exploring Velika]
- by Izulan

I was watching some men boasting of their skills near the Velika North Gate, and I became lost in thought. What could be causing such hostility?

Perhaps the defiance and will of the human race remain here due to all the time they spent wandering.

Or perhaps, the souls of the elves are still among the lands of Arun, long before the humans settled down.

...(letters are erased)...Next page.

Elves, the ancestors of the high elves, were quite different from the today's noble high elf. They were a hostile race, expanding their lands through conquest.

When the Flower of Life, the gift from Karas, was destroyed, they built a core, and split up along political lines into two factions. The high elves and the wind elves.

Later, the high elves built a prison here, somewhere near Velika's North Gate.

The Necromantic Conduit: a prison that people say no man can escape.

(Whoever wrote this must have fallen asleep just after that last line.)Stop reading.
